cause.description:
To have a support group where we can talk out our problems and be able to live and love our kids. "God only gives us what He knows we can handle." So why then do I feel like I am failing terribly. Talk to me!
1. Live and Love our children.
2. God only gave us what He knew we could handle.
3. Talk it out.
cause.mission: Talk it out! Live and Love for our children.
cause.name: ADD - Attention Defficit Disorder - Parents know you are not alone
